title: Premiere: Bravestation – Somewhere We Belong
content: Having marked their return with the majestic All We Have Is Us, we’re delighted to be premiering the next track from Toronto trio Bravestation. Somewhere We Belong is another slice of summery R&B infused pop, ushering in the warm weather with addictive harmonies and slick production. With one of the finest choruses of the year, it completes their transformation from indie pop quintet to an anthemic R&B powerhouse. Featuring on their equally fantastic new EP out next Tuesday, there’s no doubting that this summer belongs to Bravestation. Check out Somewhere We Belong below and grab a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
